sense.def: even supposing/given that N V-s; even if one assumes that N V-s
here, to this place
Oh, for the V>Nab of N!
you
you
if
苟子之不欲 "if you really do not want to" "nominalised" marked conditional subordinate clause
the N1 for the N2
the V-ing for N
me 天厭之may Heaven reject me!
咎之徒“a concomitant causing blame": causing N

忘身之老 "forget that one is old": nominaliser converting a sentence with a verbal predicate into an abstract nominalisation (sometimes best rendered in English not with a nominalisation but a that-clause when in object position)
德之不脩 "virtue's not being cultivated" Nab is passive: 之 converts a passive N V sentence into an abstract nominalisation of its content
王之於國也 "the king's relation to his state' idiomatic nominaliser of a "preposition" phrase
近日之受“the accepting it today": the Nab-ing at the time of N[TOPIC]
使穀祿多少厚薄之稱 "make the amount of salary to be appropriate": nominaliser of a (normally unnominalised) clause under a pivotal verb
予之不仁也 'oh how wicked the people are': marker of nominalisation in emphatic exclamatory clauses

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: One V>Nab subject with its V>Nab predicate nominalised

sense.def: V>Nab predicate nominalised
孔子之死也 "the death of Confucius": the V-ing of Npr
自夫子之死也 “since the death of the master“

entry.def: Zhī 之 is to go to a place, typically taking the most direct route, by any conveyance as a result of a decision and typically with the purpose of staying there for a while or conducting some business.

sense.def: go to a person N
to go (somewhere) (to do something)
go to (so as to stay there for a considerable time, or for some business); move towards
go to; move in the direction of
himself
嬰兒之未孩"a baby that has not yet smiled" 人之無良 "a person who has no goodness": restrictive relative clause marker
臣之弒君者 “ministers who assassinate their rulers"
us 用之則行"When they use us then we engage in public action"
孔子之為司寇也"When Confucius served as minister of justice": When N (or Npr) V-ed, S)
particle without grammatical function, poetic filler in a part of a line that is regularly filled with a variety of grammatical particles in adjacent lines
inversion marker, as in 何罪之有
used in superlative constructions, like “之又”
孔子之賢 "a moral worthiness virtue like THAT OF Confucius (not: the particular feature that characterises Confucius" N1=standard of comparison: the Nab like that of N
彭蠡之川 "the river Pengli": N1=class of N2: the N2 constituted by/that is none other than N1
如是之甚 "as intensely as that": modifying an adverb or adjective
少之時"(at) the time when he was young": The N characterised by S
治民之王良 "be Wang Liangs governing the people" Npr-s that are V-ing"
ADJ 之 N: 得意之色"a facial expression expressing happy satisfaction": marker of the modification of a noun by a deverbal adjectival expression
珠之重 "be as important as a pearl" be as V as the N-subject
鵬之背 "the back of the Peng" N2 inalienably attached to N1, the N2 that INALIENABLY BELONGS to or is attached to N1 AS A PART
一人之蛇"one person's snake" N2 appertains, belongs or is in some way attached to N1
N2=kin: 工匠之子 "son of a carpenter": NP2 designates a kinship relation which NP1 has to NP2
四海之內 NP1 東陵之上 "on mount Dongling" indicates the placing in space of NP2 in relation to N1
N2=characteristic feature: 魚之樂 "the joys of the fish"; Nab is a feature or characteristic of N
鄰國之政"administration of a neighbouring state": N1=grammatical object: NP1 is the object or aim of the action in Nab
N1=subject: 刑法之所大禁也"what the laws greatly forbid" NP2 is nominalised by 所, and NP1 is the subject of the VP that is nominalised
N1=scope of superlative: 士之仁者 of the gentlemen the (most!) human-hearted" of the N1 the most N2
糞土之牆 "wall made of dung" the NP2 made of NP1
今之孝者 "of the present time those who are filial-minded" NP1 indicates the placing in time of NP2
NP1 indicates the duration in time,or the time of validity of NP2 三年之喪“three-year-long mourning"
六尺之孤"six-inch-large gourd" N1=size of N2:

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: An N that RESEMBLES TYPE Npr

sense.def: 孔子之師 "a teacher like Confucius" plural：田常之賊 "villains like Tian Chang"
孝子之有深愛者"the filial sons who (by the nature of things always) have deep love" N1 which/who by the nature of things are N2
執鞭之士 "gentlemen holding the whip": V-action has N as subject/agent
N1: result/end-point of N2: 大亂之道 "the way leading to great disorder" "N2 leading to N1"

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: ADVERB modifying 所Vt in NP{所V}

sense.def: N1=time: 須臾之所學 "what one has studied in one moment of time" N1 specifies the length of time involved in the action involved in the deverbal N2
先王之政“the government by the former kings": N1=agent or subject of the Nab-ing

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: SUBJECT (not agent!) N subject of feature Nab

sense.def: 小人之學 "the petty man's studies": N1=grammatical subject but not agent of N2
N1=environment: 塗巷之人 "a man from the streets" N2 coming from N1 and having features characteristic linked to having N1 as origin
Nab=feature characterising N (many subtypes); e.g. 智術之士
N=instrument or method of V-ing: 治氣養心之術 "the method of controlling one's vital energy and cultivating one's mind" N is an instrument or method of V-ing
是非之分 "the difference between what is right and what is wrong" relationship between N1 and N2: between

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: APPURTENANCE LOCATION.THING N2 is in N1

sense.def: 杯中之物 "the thing in the cup (wine)"
N1=afflicted recipient: 人之患 "troubles of/for men" N1 is the negatively afflicted recipient of N2
如是之樓“a building like that": VP-feature modifies nominal head
國君之寶“treasure of the ruler of the state": N2 is owned by N1; N2 is the property of N1
王之臣"minister to the king": N2 is under the control of N1

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: N=OBJECT of Vt:What Vt-s the N

sense.def: 萬物之所化"what transforms all things" referring to the object of the nominalised transitive verb
神人之所以為大祥也 "that by reason of which the spirtual man is deemed greatly auspicious": adverbial use of the specified object of the Vt
罔古之所布"Where one spreads the nets" N=PLACE
勢物之徒“people aiming for power and precious objects": N2 aiming for or being preoccupied with N1
辯者之徒"people of the sophist type"斯人之徒 “this type of person": N2 classified as N1 (contrast 子夏之徒 "a disciple of Zixia")

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: N has the PURPOSE of Nab

sense.def: 聽之繩 "the basic guideline of attending to government": N2 is the standard or guideline for N1 (often N1 = Nab.act = V-ing)

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: marker of MODIFICATION of N by definite pronoun

sense.def: 當此之時"During these times" (23 times in Huainanzi alone)

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: Npr OBJECT of/subject described in N

sense.def: 先王之書"Books on the First Kings": the documents N concerned with/being about the persons Npr

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: N serving as INSTRUMENT FOR the PURPOSES of Nab

sense.def: 治之具"instrument for government": serving the purposes of, being for; being concerned with
市繁之時"the time when the market was busy":
萬乘之勢"the power that ten thousand chariots give one":

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: POLITICAL CONTROL N1 controlled by N2

sense.def: 亂國之君"ruler over an ill-governed state": CONTROL of N1 by N2, "of"

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: INSTRUMENT action as performed by the means N

sense.def: 斧鉞之誅 "execution by the use of axes" Nab2 as performed by means of Nab1
二三子之教 "a lesson FOR you people": for

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: N2 in the LOCAL STYLE of N1

sense.def: N2 made in the style defined by N1
marking the modification of an abstract N by a (bisyllabic) adjectival VP
岸谷之變 "Nab is the nominalised predicate of the subject N
百年之後 Nab refers to a temporal relation to N
白首之心 “the mindset of an old person" N's Nab
百足之蟲 “centipede" N2 characterised by the inalienable possession of N1
奔走之友 “a friend even in times of misfortune and hardship" N1 describes conditions under which N2 is N2.
脣齒之邦“countries closely linked like lips and teeth" comparability of N2 to N1
必爭之地 "the location where the battle has to be fought" N is the location for the action V
必由之路 "the path that has to be followed" N is what is the object of the transitive V
不測之禍 "unpredictable/unpredicted disaster" V-ed N
吹灰之力 "force needed to blow at ashes": N is relevantly related to V in any particular way.
采薪之患N caused by or experienced on the occasion of V-ing

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: THE N2 RESEMBLES THAT OF N1

sense.def: 赤子之心 “innocent pure heart (like that of a baby)": N2 resembling N1
陳之將亂也 “that Chen is about to revolt" N functions as agent for the nominalised V>Nab

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: N AGENT for the nominalised V>Nab

sense.def: N is agent-subject of the nominalised V>Nab
吾子之將行“your being about to leave"
the set of those who V and who resemble those who V: the V-ing and their ilk (the V can be an extensive coordinate VP.)
眾之為福 "the being a good fortune of (one's army) being numerous": modification by one V>Nab specifying the subject of another V>Nab
the event V>Nab{S} localised by N
朝廷之可以巧言辯說取官爵也 “the fact that at court one can obtain offies and ranks by clever talk and eloquent disquisitions": N is denominal adverbial localisation of S
孔子之德 "the charismatic virtue of Confucius": Nab property/inalienable possession of Npr
孔子之窮於陳蔡之見"When Confucius was in straights between Chen and Cai."
孔子之跡 "the footsteps of>from Confucius": N has its origin in Npr
孔子之門 "knock on Confucius's door" Npr (past or present!) owner of N
孔子之時 "the times of Confucius" in the times of Npr
孔子之制春秋也 "as for Confucius' production of the Annals"
《春秋》之異 "the strange disasters of/reported in the Annals": Nab is contained in or described in Npr
孔子之廟 “temple dedicated/devoted to Confucius": N is dedicated to Npr

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: N in KINSHIP RELATION to Npr

sense.def: 孔子之孫 "a grandson of Confucius": an N related by kinship to Npr
孔子之體 “Confucius's body" N is inalienable part of Npr
孔子之見疑 "Confucius' being the object of suspicion": Npr being V-ed

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: Nab that RESEMBLES THAT OF Npr

sense.def: 孔子之才 "talent like that of Confucius": Nab that resembles that of Npr
七十子之徒 “people like the 70 disciples (of Confucius)": people of the type exemplified by Npr
孔子之徒 "person of the caliber of Confucius": person of the type exemplified by Npr
孔子之座"Confucius' seat": Npr's N
殺人之罪 "The crime consisting in V-ing": the Nab specified by V-ing
寡人之罪 "my own fault": npro2 is the responsible origin of Nab
位於七人之下 "his status was lower than that of seven others": N2 abstractly related to N1
a nominalised abstract feature of an Nab
V>Nab modified by Nab
be Nab in relation to N
布衣之士 'a freeman wearing humble garment': N2 characterised by a concrete, physical feature N1
墨子之説 "Mocius's theories": N1 is thr origin/author of N2
this, these 之二虫 "these two (kinds of) creatures" (ZHUANG)
this item, this thing
a certain object, the relevant object
孔子之仕於魯者“while Confucius was serving as an official in Lu": while
使之富 "cause them to become rich" him, her, it, them
與之俱 "be together with him"
則臣服之"the ministers will then follow it": referring to an aforementioned object: him, her, it
臣聞之“I have heard the following:" the following object, the object identified further down in the context
誨女知之乎！"I'll teach you to understand things": things; a place; something [cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference]
知之曰知之 "if you understand something say that you understand IT" anaphorically refers to whatever a preceding nonreferential object pronoun refers to
賜之卮酒 "offered him a beaker of wine"
此之謂 莫之，未之
rarely used as an apparently full pronominal subject: this one 之十有三"these are thirteen in number"
欲之“I wish to do this": (wish) to do this
主信愛之“If the ruler trusts and looks well after one": indefinite, personally "one" in the function of object
君好之“If the ruler likes something/anything": non-referential general: anything/anyone
以善和人者謂之順 "to accord with others on good points THAT is called obedience": refers to the aforementioned situation
object in a negative sentence: 不復聽之
the important things, relevant matters
= 其所V the thing he/she/it/they V(s) etc. (rare)
